name: 4 Times Faster
effect: Effect: Look at all the cards in your opponent's hand. Then, you can move both player's Turn Marker up by 4. In that case. At the end of your opponent's next turn, move both player's Turn Marker down by 4.

name: 8 Trigrams Palms Rotation
effect:
Requirements: "Byakugan" + "Printed Entrance cost of 3 or more"
Traget: Every Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: During this turn, each time the target uses a Jutsu card and it's effect is applied, give 1 Damage to the target.
"He blocked all my attacks with his chakra!?"

name: A Thousand Years of Death
effect:
Requirements:"A printed Entrance cost of 3 or more"
Target: 1 Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: Select 1 of the following and apply it:
(1) Change the target to injured status.
(2) Negate the target's effect texts during this turn.
"Secret Taijutsu technique…!!"

name: A Treasure Puppet
effect:
Requirements: "Sasori"

name: Anko Mitarashi
effect:
Leaf | Special Jonin | Female | Proctor | Mental Power: 1

If this Ninja is sent out to Attack, this Ninja's Team can only be Blocked by a Team of 2 or less Ninjas during the turn.

name: Assault Blade
effect:
Requirements: "A printed Entrance cost of 4 or more"
Target: 1 of your opponent's Ninjas
Effect: Flip a Ninja Blade coin twice; If you get a heads only once, change the target to injured status. If you get a heads twice, move the target to its owner's Chakra area.
"You stay back."

name: Bad Omen
effect: Effect: Apply the following effect twice. Your opponent shuffles their Deck and reveals the top card of their Deck. If it's a Jutsu, Mission, or a Client card, you win a Battle Reward. Then, return the revealed card to the top of their Deck.
"I normally don't trust these things…"

name: Beginning of the New Chronicle
effect: Effect: Put in play a "Squad" card from your Squad Deck only if you don't have any of the Ninjas listed on that "Squad" Ninja card in play.

Permanent (3)

name: Power of the Cursed Blood
effect:
Requirements: "Sasuke Uchiha" + "A printed Entrance cost of 4 or more" or "Itachi Uchiha"
Effect: Move your opponent's Turn Marker down by 2.

name: Puppet Show
effect: Effect: If you have "Crow", "Black Ant", and "Salamander" in your Chakra area and none in play, put 1 of each in play. If not, search for up to 1 copy of each in your Deck and move them to your Chakra area. Then, shuffle your Deck.
"I'm taking Gaara back!"

name: Quota
effect:
Permanent (2)
Effect: When this Mission card is removed from play before removing the last Ninja Blade coin from this Mission card, you win 3 Battle Rewards. This Mission card cannot be negated or removed from play by effects except the one of "Fulfilling the Quota" Mission card.

name: Radio
effect:
Target: 1 of your Stand-By Ninjas

name: Rasengan
effect:

Target: Every Ninja Battling against the user

name: Reinforcement from Sand
effect: Effect: If your opponent has 2 or more Battle Rewards than you do when this Mission card's effect is applied, you can put in play 1 Ninja from your hand. The Entrance cost of that Ninja has to be equal to or less than the number of your opponent's in-play Ninjas.
"Sorry, we are late." "Temari!"

name: Report
effect: Effect: Search for 1 card in your Deck and move it to your Discard Pile.

name: Rock Lee
effect: Leaf | Male | Chunin | Growth

name: Rock Lee
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male | Growth

During your Mission Phase, you can select 1 of your opponent's in-play Ninjas with 1 or less Entrance cost. In that case, discard that Ninja and this Ninja.

name: Rock Lee
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male | Growth

Valid: During the Mission Phase, you can flip a Ninja Blade coin; If it's heads, double the original Combat value (both healthy and injured status) of this NInja during the turn. If it's tails, the original Combat value (both healthy and injured status) of this Ninja becomes 0 during this turn.
"Here I cooooooome!!"

name: Rock Lee
effect:
Leaf | Male | Chunin | Growth

name: Sakon
effect:
Sound | Male | The Four Sound Ninja | Ambush

Leaf | Female | Chunin | Medical | Growth | Mental Power: 3

effect:
Leaf | Female | Chunin | Medical | Growth | Mental Power: 3

Akatsuki | Rogue Ninja | Jonin | Male | Puppet Master | Ambush | Mental Power: 3

effect:
Akatsuki | Rogue Ninja | Jonin | Male | Puppet Master | Mental Power: 3 | Squad

Akatsuki | Rogue Ninja | Jonin | Puppet | Male | Puppet Master | Mental Power: 3 | Name: Sasori

Permanent
